alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 01 at 6:27PM EDT until September 02 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT/830 PM EDT/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Panhandle Florida, including the following county, Jackson. Portions of southwest Georgia, including the following county, Seminole. * WHEN...Until 730 PM CDT /830 PM EDT/. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 527 PM CDT /627 PM EDT/, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Chattahoochee, Sneads, Grand Ridge, Cypress, Dellwood, Drakes Still, Fairchild, Two Egg, Haynes, Lake Seminole, Buena Vista, Lovedale, Seminole State Park, Star, Blue Spring, Alliance, Simsville, Union City and Sink Creek. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
